price: آيا رب مو تاسو ته زامن در پېرزو كړل او خپل ځان ته يې ملايكې لوڼې ونيولې، يقيناً تاسو ډېره لويه (غلطه) خبره كوئ.
arabic: أَفَأَصۡفَىٰكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ وَٱتَّخَذَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنَٰثًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: afa-aṣfākum rabbukum bil-banīna wa-ittakhadha mina al-malāikati ināthan innakum lataqūlūna qawlan ʿaẓīman
translations: Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
